# Nice Tat

> Astro Site Template inspired by Casey Neistat's 
> ultra minimal personal site.

## About

Nice Tat is a minimal, fast, static site template 
built with Astro. Great for a LinkInBio type site 
or a placeholder while you work on your personal 
site.

## Features

- Ultra minimal design
- Dark mode support
- Mobile responsive
- Fast static generation
- Easy to customize

## Pages

- /: Homepage with social links
- /contact: Contact routing page
- /business-inquiry: Business contact info
- /something-else: General contact info
- /how-to-use: Template usage guide
- /onlyfans: Example page

## Tech Stack

- Astro (static site generator)
- Tailwind CSS (styling)
- JetBrains Mono (typography)

## Links

- GitHub: https://github.com/ThatGuySam/nice-tat
- Deploy: Works on Netlify, Vercel, Cloudflare
